about_the_game:
Version

Aver.Aza26012025Aza. (a26-01-2025a Ver.)

About this game

This is a simple semi-nsfw themed JRPG. This JRPG is created using RPG Maker MV This JRPG is very short and can be completed in less than 30 minutes, emphasizing the story element of saving several kingdoms. The player is given an unlimited power, money and inventory. All of that, so the players can only enjoy the story elements in it. intended for casual gamers. Note 1: All main characters age are over 18. Note 2: Some princesses or heroines character design are inspired from princess Solange (Code of Princess) with quite a lot of modification. Note 3: Animeahikoaprinceaverses are Akihiko Prince's intellectual property. Part of Japan/Nihon's art and culture and part of Japan/Nihon and Indonesia's product. Akihiko Prince is a paternal grandson of Colonel (Purn.) Prince (Raden) A.S.Son.S. The protagonist, A Micro Prince Akihiko Adisony Akazaka is a self-insert character of Akihiko Prince.

Story

A Micro Prince Akihiko Adisony Akazaka, the prince from modern kingdom Akazaka alongside with his wife, A Micro Princess Aechara from modern kingdom Andong got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, A Micro Prince Akihiko Adisony Akazaka and A Micro Princess Aechara decided to save all princesses.

Features

  • JRPG battle turn based

  • Adventure up to 6 kingdom (each kingdom have 1 town & 1 castle with the interior and NPC. only items shop and weapon shop all pruchases able for player)

  • Casual (Easy Mode, only focus on story)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10(32)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
